phrases: Father was hopping mad, you know.
I did not do anything!
After what those guys said about you.
Ayato, do you understand why Father's forbidden you to fight?
You have tremendous power.
But excessive power can end up hurting not just others...
but you yourself as well, Ayato.
I do not get it.
At any rate, you are still too young, Ayato.
Then when can I start?
I guess when you find what it is that you are supposed to do, Ayato.
What I am supposed to do?
Right.
And that will probably be the day
that you decide how you are going to use that power.
Have you already found what it is that you are supposed to do, Big Sister?
Of course.
What I am supposed to do is protect you, Ayato.
And for me, that is the most important thing of all.
Then...
Then I am going to protect you, too, Big Sister!
That will be my...
Oh, that is right.
Ser Veresta
Hey, is that you, Julis?
What a coincidence!
Fancy meeting you here.
You!
What are you doing here?
Who the hell are you?!
Hey!
He is that transfer student!
What the hell?
I am Ayato Amagiri.
Nice to meet you.
Why, you...
Awesome!
Awesome!
Hey, who said you could record this?!
Lester, pushing it any further would be a bad idea!
Well, I am not giving up!
I am going to make you acknowledge my abilities if it is the last thing I do!
First the duel this morning,
and now your cool-headedness in confronting Lester...
You really are a tough one.
Am I really?
It will be quite the spectacle, seeing how long that look of innocence will last.
This is not as forgiving a place as you think, you know.
Then why are you fighting here, Julis?
You are a princess, are not you?
For money.
I am in need of money, you see.
That is why I am fighting here.
First off, the Phoenix Festa.
That is the first thing I have got to conquer.
Then have you already found a partner?
Phoenix is a tag-team Festa, you know.
Julis, do not you have any friends?
I-It is not because I do not have any friends that I have not found a partner yet, all right?
Well, it is true that I have no friends.
But that is irrelevant!
I simply have not found anyone who meets my standards as a partner.
So you readily admit that you do not have any friends.
By the way, what kind of partner are you looking for?
Well, beggars cannot be choosers,
but at most, someone with Page One-level combat skills,
who has a quick mind, a strong will, and a noble spirit, much like a knight.
High bar, much?
Whoops, my deadline's coming up!
All right, guys, I am out of here!
I suppose I will be heading back myself.
Hey... uh... Julis?
What is it?
W-Which way's the boys' dorm again?
Really, now!
After what you went through this morning...
You could at least do your homework and study the guide map!
What is wrong?
No... I just thought, so you do laugh like that sometimes.
Wh-Wh-Where did that come from?!
Even I have been known to laugh at times!
If you go straight that way, you will come to a path that leads to the boys' dorm!
Just keep to it from there!
Now what?!
Would you mind showing me around the academy sometime?
And while we are at it, the city, too.
Is that some kind of joke?!
Why should I?!
But you said yourself that you would do anything I asked, just once.
True, I did say that...
But is that all you want?
Yeah.
First, I have got to get used to this academy, right?
I suppose it cannot be helped.
A debt is a debt, after all.
All right, then, I will show you around the academy tomorrow after class,
and we will tour the city on our next day off...
How is that?
Good morning, Julis.
Right, good morning.
Hey, did you hear that?
Did that princess actually return someone is greeting?
H-How rude is that, you wretches?!
Even I am known to return greetings, too!
S-Saya?
Ayato?
What are you doing here, Saya?!
Hey, what is this?
You guys know each other?
Yeah...
What a shock.
I have not seen you since you moved overseas,
so does that make it six years or so?
Yeah.
I am totally in shock.
Still, you have not changed at all, have you, Saya?
It is like you are exactly the way you were back then.
That is not true.
I have gotten taller, for one thing.
Y-You have?
I got to say, what a small world!
This might even be one of those fateful reunions!
Fateful reunion?
Yeah, well-put, Yabuki.
By the way, how is your dad doing?
He is almost doing too well.
I wish he would slow down.
The reason I came here is because Dad told me to.
Your dad?
He told me to get some exposure for the gun he invented.
That is the reason?
I had my own reasons, too.
So I do not mind.
I see.
And what would that reason be?
Well, that is...
a secret.
Ah, yes.
I see, I see...
Better not get any tasteless ideas.
Gotcha, loud and clear!
All right, all right, sit yourselves down!
Homeroom's now in session!
Well, if it is not you, Sasamiya!
Good morning.
So why were you a no-show yesterday, huh?
I will hear you out, so talk to me!
I merely overslept.
I see, you overslept, huh?
Ohhh... ouch.
Idiot!
How many times have you pulled this?!
You are taking a make-up class on your next day off, got it?!
Looks like you still have trouble getting up in the morning, too.
My bed holds me hostage.
Well, I guess that should do.
Do you remember that park we always used to play in as kids?
Yeah.
Where there was a huge lake, right?
Right, right!
Remember when we...
Are you ready yet?
Hey, Julis.
Okay, I am depending on you.
I have no choice.
A promise is a promise, after all.
What promise?
Julis's going to give me a tour of the academy today.
Riessfeld is?
But why?
Because...
Well, it is quite complicated.
It is no concern of yours, Sasamiya.
Come on, let us go.
Uh, right!
Hold up.
I will show Ayato around.
You said I have no choice, Riessfeld.
In that case, you should not have a problem with me taking your place.
I appreciate your offer,
but unfortunately, I have no intention of breaking a promise I have made.
But I think Ayato would rather have me than a guide who is not into it.
It is not that I am not into it!
In the first place, whereas you just started here this year, Sasamiya...
As someone who is been here since junior high, I would make a far better guide!
Hey, both of you...
Well!
If that is the criteria,
then that certainly makes me the most qualified, does not it?
After all, Julis transferred in during our third year of junior high,
but I have been a bona fide student here since first year.
Who are you?
What are you doing here?
Actually, before you do anything else, get away from me, Claudia!
My goodness, you are all so callous.
Since I am here, I wanted to join in on the fun, but...
No way.
Permission denied!
In that case, why do not I just take care of business and withdraw?
Look...
They are touching me, okay?
Here.
Take a look at this.
As I mentioned the other day,
your Lux weapon selection and compatibility test will be held tomorrow.
If there are no issues, please sign those documents.
Oh, that is what you are here for.
If the student council president is hand-delivering mere documents,
you must have a lot of time on your hands.
Yes, as our students are all such good children, it makes our jobs so much easier.
I have been wondering about this yesterday, but are you two friends?
- Yes, indeed we are!
- Not on your life!
My, my, how cold we are!
We are longtime acquaintances
who have run into each other at the Vienna Opera House Ball several times.
If you are done here, then why do not you take off?
Shoo, shoo!
Good day to you.
However, tomorrow I am going to have Ayato all to myself, so...
consider yourself warned!
Seriously, that vixen!
Getting so carried away just because her breasts are somewhat large!
At the end of the day, those things are nothing but fat, anyway!
Agreed.
Hey!
All right, then,
since you are both here, maybe I will have you both show me around?
Very well.
Oh, why not?
It would be a pain to argue any further, anyway.
This is the Club Building.
Well, I suppose you will be making your way here
when you want to lodge a complaint with the media clubs.
This is the Committee Center.
If you have any issues with your benefits, you need to go through here.
I see.
There are seven different places to eat on campus,
but since this underground cafeteria is often relatively empty, you should use it.
That is news to me.
You know, Sasamiya, it is not like I am showing you around, you know.
Well, but I am directionally-challenged.
Then I am amazed that you still insisted on giving the tour yourself!
That is not a compliment!
H-Hey, let us take a break.
I will go get us some drinks.
Riessfeld, I want to ask you something.
What is it?
Why do you have to show Ayato around?
Because I owed him, that is why.
That is all there is to it.
Owed him how?
In the middle of a duel, see...
Duel?
You mean you dueled Ayato, Riessfeld?
That is right.
Did not you know?
How did it end?
We were interrupted midway.
So the duel was voided.
That does not make sense.
What about it does not?
After dueling Ayato, there is no way that you would live to tell the tale.
You are powerful, Riessfeld.
I do know that.
But at best, you are about my level.
And that is not good enough to take on Ayato.
You are full of swagger, are not you?
Fine.
Want to test that theory?
Those arrows...
The same as that other one!
So I have been caught off-guard yet again!
Burst into bloom, Longiflorum!
Boom.
What in the world is that?
A 38-type Lux grenade launcher, the Helnekrom.
A grenade launcher?!
Yeah.
Burst.
Kaboom.
You are a lot more extreme than you look.
Not as much as you, Riessfeld.
Shall we continue?
No, let us call it off.
Fine, then.
Hey, what is all this?
What happened here?
Why are you in such a rush?
Hey... do not look!
If you look at me, you are so dead!
I am not looking!
I am not looking!
Hmm, totally see-through.
Now this is lurid.
Come on!
At least try to cover yourself a bit, too, Sasamiya!
Wait!
You... where are your undergarments?
So tragic...
I do not need them yet.
I hear you had quite a time yesterday.
SEIDOUKAN ACADEMY TOP 5 ATTACKED
Yeah, I guess so.
Do you think the suspects will be caught?
To be honest, that might prove difficult.
The Disciplinary Committee has been investigating,
but the suspect is nowhere to be found, and not a clue in sight, I hear.
No matter how you look at it, was not yesterday's incident a clear-cut crime?
- If that is the case... - Yes...
Asterisk does have its own police force,
STAR HUNTER POLICE UNIT
but its jurisdiction does not extend to the school grounds.
If only Julis were a bit more cooperative,
there would be measures that we could take.
Yeah, she is like, No need for an investigation or bodyguards.
Why is she being so stubborn?
Most likely, it is all that girl can do to protect what is in her own hands.
Should she try to acquire something new,
what she already has could slip through her fingers.
What is in her own hands...
Here we are!
What is this?
So you are already here?
This is our other Ogre Lux applicant.
What the...
What are you doing here?!
Have you two already met, by any chance?
So what is the process for renting out a Lux?
It is quite simple.
We measure your compatibility with the Lux you are requesting,
and if it is over 80, you can check it out.
What is this?
Mr. MacPhail's chosen the Ser Veresta?
My goodness...
All right, let us go!
So that is the Ser Veresta...
The Ogre Lux that my sister might have used.
What was that?
We are ready to start testing.
Please begin.
Current compatibility rate... 32.
Do not mess with me!
He is been rejected.
I have heard about the Ogre Luxes having something like a will of their own, but...
is that what I am seeing?
I am not done yet!
Not that his power-at-all-costs mindset is all that repulsive...
But apparently, the Ser Veresta cannot be persuaded by force alone.
You can tell?
Because I, too, am an Ogre Lux wielder.
Damn you!
Why will not you obey me?!
Now, this does not look good.
You will do as I say, dammit!
The compatibility rate's slipped into negative territory!
Proceeding any further would be dangerous!
Please withdraw immediately!
Ayato!
I guess I have no choice.
Ayato!
Sorry, but I do not like being pestered.
Just like you!
Just what I would expect of you, Ayato.
That was masterful.
C-Compatibility... 97!
Condition... all green!
So do you think they will be okay with passing this on to me?
What am I doing here again?
Ayato?
Because I trust you, I would like to ask a favor of you.
Tonight, could you possibly make a little time for me?
Claudia?
I am coming in.
Oh, my... so you are here?
Oh, Ayato!
Timing your arrival to coincide with my exit from the shower!
I would expect no less of you.
But the truth is...
Episode 3 - A Holiday for Two
I am so scheming.
